title: Introducing Website Segments in Custom Industry | Similarweb
description: New Similarweb Digital Research Intelligence feature: Website segments in custom industry is now live. Build, view, and analyze any market, any way you like
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesNew Feature: The Most Granular Way to Analyze any Sector or Market Updates New Feature: The Most Granular Way to Analyze any Sector or Market Start your free trial by Liz March , Digital Research Specialist 3 Min. January 11, 2023 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic When companies need to do more with less, segmentation is one of the fastest ways to find, view, and analyze the individual lines of business that matter most. Website Segments in Custom Industry, the newest feature from Similarweb Research Intelligence, puts you in the driving seat, giving you full control over the data you view as part of your market analysis. While broad market insights are useful, businesses need to isolate specific intel about key business lines to unpack and track performance over time. With our latest feature, Similarweb Digital Research Intelligence customers can access granular market-level data and confidently spot and explore strategic market opportunities across any line of business. Here’s what you need to know. Tailormade markets, built by you With Custom Industry, you can build and analyze a bespoke market based on the industry players you care to track. Website Segments in Custom Industry gives you an element of granularity that exists nowhere else in our market. Letting you create a bespoke market view, that aggregates multiple players and business lines in a single view. Speed up your time to insight Sorting and sifting through irrelevant data takes time. When resources are limited, the ability to track and analyze several segments in a single view lets you quickly see the insights that can have the greatest impact on your analysis. Size any market, any time Modern markets are complex, often formed from a collection of pure players vs. players who do business across multiple product lines. And a whole market perspective can skew the view of opportunities, shifts, and trends. Now, you can establish the true market size for each line of business you’re in. Moving you from mass market sizing to a distinct micro-market view. Feature spotlight Market: US Finance Sector – Credit Card Lines What: I want to size and analyze pure players in the U.S credit card market (think Amex or Visa), along with companies offering a broad range of financial products (think USAA, Wells Fargo). How: Watch me build a custom market of segments and websites in less than 60 seconds. Within Website Market Analysis, I choose ‘custom industry.’ Then, I build a market by adding nine individual segments (comparators) and three websites (pure players). On the right, you can see my segment taking form as I add new segments and sites. Once complete, I apply the correct country filter and name my industry. Result: Welcome to granular market-level intelligence I’ve now built a custom industry made only from those players and lines of business I want to track. From here, I can view tailored insights and a market analysis that shows: market performance, market leaders, market trends, and marketing channel performance. Similarweb gives you complete control of the data you do and don’t see – letting you quickly and confidently explore strategic opportunities within individual lines of business. We empower you to do more Similarweb continues to enhance and develop new features, enabling organizations to thrive and survive in turbulent times. While traditional market data remains rigid and limited, our data is flexible and vast. With current market conditions presenting frequent challenges, having access to granular market-level datasets gives you the competitive advantage you need to succeed. This feature is NOW LIVE for all Similarweb Digital Research Intelligence customers on the Advanced or Ultimate package. For more information, to upgrade, or get help with this feature, please speak to your account manager. Read: A guide to using the Custom Industry Feature. FAQs Where can I find Website Segments in Custom Industries? Navigate to the Similarweb platform and click on Market Analysis > Web Market Analysis > Custom Industry. I’m on the Similarweb Digital Research Intelligence Essential plan; how can I access this new feature? You’ll need to upgrade your plan to access this new feature. Please speak to your account manager in the first instance to discuss your options. How is ‘Segments in Custom Industry’ different from ‘Segment Analysis’? Segment Analysis examines one website segment in depth. However, Segments in Custom Industries is different; here’s how. A total view of the selected market (i.e., total visits). Trend data, such as market share over time. Custom industry is created with up to 300 entities (mix of sites and segments. Measure a variety of segments from different websites at the market level. Is there a limit to how many segments I can add to a custom industry? You can add up to 10 segments to a custom industry. However, to add a segment to a custom industry, you must first create it in ‘Segment Analysis.’ What devices does this feature measure? This feature covers desktop metrics only. by Liz March Digital Research Specialist Liz March has 15 years of experience in content creation. She enjoys the outdoors, F1, and reading, and is pursuing a BSc in Environmental Science.
